ability.name: Unlikely Weapon
ability.description: * You cannot play a card on Unlikely Weapon except through the effect of another card. * While there is a card on Unlikely Weapon, add 2 (Strong: 3, Weak: 1) to Damage generated by abilities. * At the end of combat, discard the card on Unlikely Weapon.
ability.flavor: A long wooden spoon, a rolling pin, a broom, a mop, a rake, a shovel, a sword.
